member.param: A string representing a word to be searched for.
member.returns: true if the word is found within the dictionary; otherwise false

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.SpellCheckerDictionaryBase.HasWord(System.String)

summary.para: Indicates whether the current dictionary contains a specified word.

member.param: A object that represents the word being searched for.
member.returns: true if the dictionary has this word, false if the word is not found within the dictionary.

member.value: A object that represents a word in a dictionary.

summary.para: When implemented in inherited classes, loads and initializes the dictionary.

member.value: true if the dictionary is loaded; otherwise false.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.NotInDictionaryWordFoundEventArgs.#ctor(System.String,DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.SuggestionCollection,DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.SpellCheckOperation,System.String,DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.Parser.Position,DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.Parser.Position,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Initializes a new NotInDictionaryWordFoundEventArgs class instance.

member.param: A object representing a word not found in a dictionary.
A object, representing the result of a suggestion search.
A enumeration member, which defines the action which the spellchecker should perform.
A string, representing the most relevant suggested word.
A object, representing the position in the text where the word begins.
A object, representing the length of a word.
When this parameter is set to true, the default event handling code is not executed.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.NotInDictionaryWordFoundEventArgs.Suggestions

summary.para: Gets a collection of suggestions made when the word is not found in the dictionary.

member.value: A object that contains suggestions for the word under consideration.

A object representing a collection of suggested words.

summary.para: Provides access to the collection of prepared suggestions.

member.value: A object containing prepared suggestions.

summary.para: Represents a method that will handle the event.

summary.para: Provides data for the RepeatedWordFound event.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.RepeatedWordFoundEventArgs.#ctor(System.String,DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.SpellCheckOperation,System.String,DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.Parser.Position,DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.Parser.Position,System.Boolean)

summary.para: Initializes a new RepeatedWordFoundEventArgs class instance.

member.param: A object representing a repeated word found.
A enumeration member, which defines the action which the spellchecker should perform.
An empty string, since the repeated word can only be deleted.
A object, representing the position in the text where the repeated word begins.
A object, representing the length of the repeated word.
When this parameter is set to true, the default event handling code is not executed.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.RepeatedWordFoundEventArgs.Handled

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether default event actions are required.

member.value: true if the default action should be executed, false if the event is passed to the user for handling.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.RepeatedWordFoundEventArgs.Length

summary.para: Gets the length of the repeated word.

member.value: An integer, specifying the word's length.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.RepeatedWordFoundEventArgs.Result

summary.para: Gets or sets the parameter that specifies the spell checker action when a repeated word is found.

member.value: A enumeration specifying the spell checker action.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.RepeatedWordFoundEventArgs.StartPosition

summary.para: Gets the beginning of the repeated word in a text.

member.value: A object, representing the position in the text where the repeated word begins.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.RepeatedWordFoundEventArgs.Suggestion

summary.para: A string to replace the repeated word.

member.value: A to replace the repeated word.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraSpellChecker.RepeatedWordFoundEventArgs.Word

summary.para: Gets a word that is found to be repeated.

member.value: A object representing a repeated word in the text.
